```{r}
library(tidyverse)
InventoryData <- read_csv("InventoryData.csv")
inventory = InventoryData
summary(inventory)
inventorya <- filter(inventory, Supplier=="A")
inventorya = mutate(inventorya, OnHandRatio = `On Hand` / `Annual Demand`)

```

```{r}
avg_cost <- inventorya %>%
  group_by(`Item SKU`) %>%                        # Group by Item SKU
  summarise(SKUAvgCost = mean(`Cost per Unit ($)`, na.rm = TRUE))
```



```{r}
diamonddata = diamonds
```

```{r}
ggplot(diamonddata, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(diamonddata$carat), max(diamonddata$carat), by = 0.5)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(min(diamonddata$price), max(diamonddata$price), by = 500)) +
  facet_wrap(~ color)
```
